description:
gotest: make _testmain.go conform to gofmt rules

Otherwise, running "gofmt -d ." after "gotest" gives some
spurious changes.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=5cac620904ce ***

gotest: make _testmain.go conform to gofmt rules

Otherwise, running "gofmt -d ." after "gotest" gives some
spurious changes.

R=golang-dev, adg
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5504101

Committer: Andrew Gerrand <adg@golang.org>

subject: code review 5504101: gotest: make _testmain.go conform to gofmt rules
